conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: What do your parents do for a living?

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: My parents own a shipping business, we transport goods and people from one place to another.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: That sounds interesting, do you work there too?

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: I used to help out, but now I run my own clothing store. But I still have connections with the business, that's how I know the ships schedule and destinations.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: I see, do they go to any specific place?

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: Yes, one of our most frequent destinations is Nalor. It's a beautiful city, with a bustling market and friendly people. It's the perfect place to start a new life.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: That sounds perfect, how can I escape by one of the ships?

conversation.speaker: Gypsum
conversation.text: I can arrange for you to be on the next ship to Nalor. It's the perfect opportunity for you to escape and start a new life in a new place.
